summary: Pan American World Airways, or Pan Am, was a famous American airline from the 1920s to 1991. It was the biggest international airline of its time and made air travel exciting and glamorous. Pan Am was the first to use big jets like the Boeing 747 and had a cool blue globe logo. It flew to many countries and was like America's flag carrier without being owned by the government. But in the 1970s, things got tough, and it faced competition from other airlines. Pan Am tried to change but eventually went out of business. Even today, people remember Pan Am for its cool uniforms, fancy planes, and how it made traveling the world seem special.
title: Pan Am
